MemberSignature.Value: public static void ApplyUpdate (System.Reflection.Assembly assembly, ReadOnlySpan<byte> metadataDelta, ReadOnlySpan<byte> ilDelta, ReadOnlySpan<byte> pdbDelta);

.method public static hidebysig void ApplyUpdate(class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly, valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> metadataDelta, valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> ilDelta, valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> pdbDelta) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ApplyUpdate (assembly As Assembly, metadataDelta As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), ilDelta As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), pdbDelta As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte))
static member ApplyUpdate : System.Reflection.Assembly * ReadOnlySpan<byte> * ReadOnlySpan<byte> * ReadOnlySpan<byte> -> unit
public: static void ApplyUpdate(System::Reflection::Assembly ^ assembly, ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> metadataDelta, ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> ilDelta, ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> pdbDelta);

Docs.param: The metadata changes to be applied.
The IL changes to be applied.
The PDB changes to be applied.
Docs.summary: Updates the specified assembly using the provided metadata, IL, and PDB deltas.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Currently executing methods will continue to use the existing IL. New executions of modified methods will use the new IL. Different runtimes may have different limitations on what kinds of changes are supported, and runtimes make no guarantees as to the state of the assembly and process if the delta includes unsupported changes.

Docs.exception: The assembly argument is not a runtime assembly.
The update could not be applied.

public: static property bool IsSupported { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the assembly update is enabled and available.
Docs.value: if the assembly update is enabled and available; otherwise, .
